title.newValue: Outlook: Dictation support in the new Outlook for Windows and web

description.oldValue: Dictation lets you use speech-to-text to author messages in Outlook with a microphone and reliable internet connection. It's a quick and easy way to draft emails, send replies, and capture the tone you're going for.
description.newValue: Dictation lets you use speech-to-text to author messages in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows with a microphone and reliable internet connection. It's a quick and easy way to draft emails, send replies, and capture the tone you're going for.
